subject: Horse Racing
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Horses
lead_paragraph: The bay colt Nicanor, the full brother to Barbaro, who was euthanized in 2007, will be ready for his first race later this month or next. Will he, too, be a star?
snippet: The bay colt Nicanor, the full brother to Barbaro, who was euthanized in 2007, will be ready for his first race later this month or next. Will he, too, be a star?
